description.value: Once per day, you can spend 10 minutes studying your surroundings in search of omens related to a particular course of action to cast @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Augury]{Augury} as an innate divine spell. Unless the result of theaugurywas "nothing," you gain the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Call Upon the Brightness]{Call Upon the Brightness} reaction for the next 30 minutes.
